trevino morales 's arrest has been greeted as a possible turning point in the war against drugs cartels in mexico . samuel gonzalez , former top anti-drug prosecutor , said : ' i think this capture is summary: trevino morales , known as ` z-40 ' was caught in nuevo laredo on monday .   trademark murder method was ` the stew ' - burning men alive in barrels .   crimes include murder of 72 migrants in 2010 and massacre of 192 in 2011 .   zetas known for brutal crimes in mexico , including mass slaughters .   his arrest is hailed a boon for president enrique pena nieto .
